attributes.action: Emergency application to rejoin EU in solidarity with EU27 and Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details:
Putin’s actions have upended global, European, and national politics - including politics of Brexit. It is blindingly clear that we should rejoin ASAP. 
Any discussion of UK prospects after this war must reconsider Brexit.  UK has been weak, isolated, indecisive and too slow.  Churchill had no such problem, and wanted union with France in 1940.  Postwar he wanted a sort of United States of Europe. https://rm.coe.int/16806981f3 

Churchill knew we would be stronger together.
attributes.background:
Europe will be stronger together if we rejoin. UK is too isolated at this critical time: combined strength of EU member states best expressed with one European voice, including UK. 

Ukraine’s urgent application blazes the way. Putin‘s actions make desperate cases, needing drastic solutions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600832
